title: Looking for Solo/Duo Queue PLAT 5+

embed.description: KANG / Platinum 5 0LP / 51W 57L Win Ratio 47% / Syndra - 16W 10L Win Ratio 62%, Viktor - 11W 10L Win Ratio 52%, Twisted Fate - 5W 3L Win Ratio 63%, Lee Sin - 4W 4L Win Ratio 50%, Ryze - 2W 4L Win Ratio 33%

body:
Highest Rank was P2 back in Season 4.
My main roles are Mid/Jg
My most comfortable champions are Syndra & Twisted Fate & Viktor
Can also play Lee Sin/Vi/Hecarim if I get Jungle.

Looking for a consistent player to constantly improve with and to climb to Diamond this season. 
Player must be driven and always looking to improve and can give/take constructive criticism.

Preferably someone who is Plat 5+ & can available to join discord

Send a Friend Request
